description: This file defines REST API routes for user management in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting users, utilizing services and models for user data handling and security.

methods.name: UserPublic create_user(payload: UserCreate, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new user, requiring admin role.

methods.name: List[UserPublic] list_users(token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all users, requiring admin role.

methods.name: UserPublic get_user(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific user by ID, requiring admin role.

methods.name: UserPublic update_user(user_id: str, payload: UserUpdate, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update user details by ID, requiring admin role.

methods.name: None delete_user(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a user by ID, requiring admin role.

ctags.name: create_user
ctags.pattern: /^def create_user(payload: UserCreate, token: Optional[str] = None) -> UserPublic:$/

ctags.name: delete_user
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_user(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None) -> None:$/

ctags.name: get_user
ctags.pattern: /^def get_user(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None) -> UserPublic:$/

ctags.name: update_user
ctags.pattern: /^def update_user(user_id: str, payload: UserUpdate, token: Optional[str] = None) -> UserPublic:$/
ctags.signature: (user_id: str, payload: UserUpdate, token: Optional[str] = None)
